PackingContext.h

2 #define ZSERIO_PACKING_CONTEXT_H_INC

4 #include <vector>

8 #include "zserio/OptionalHolder.h"
9 
10 namespace zserio
11 {
12 
13 namespace detail
14 {
15 
16 // calculates bit length on delta provided as an absolute number
17 inline uint8_t absDeltaBitLength(uint64_t absDelta)
18 {
19  uint8_t result = 0;
20  while (absDelta > 0)
21  {
22  result++;
23  absDelta >>= 1;
24  }
25 
26  return result;
27 }
28 
29 // calculates bit length, emulates Python bit_length to keep same logic
30 template <typename T>
31 uint8_t calcBitLength(T lhs, T rhs)
32 {
33  const uint64_t absDelta = lhs > rhs
34  ? static_cast<uint64_t>(lhs) - static_cast<uint64_t>(rhs)
35  : static_cast<uint64_t>(rhs) - static_cast<uint64_t>(lhs);
36 
37  return absDeltaBitLength(absDelta);
38 }
39 
40 // calculates delta, doesn't check for possible int64_t overflow since it's used only in cases where it's
41 // already known that overflow cannot occur
42 template <typename T>
43 int64_t calcUncheckedDelta(T lhs, uint64_t rhs)
44 {
45  return static_cast<int64_t>(static_cast<uint64_t>(lhs) - rhs);
46 }
47 
48 } // namespace detail
49 
61 class DeltaContext
62 {
63 public:
70  void reset()
71  {
72  m_isPacked = false;
73  m_maxBitNumber = 0;
74  m_previousElement.reset();
75  m_processingStarted = false;
76  }
77 
83  template <typename ELEMENT_TYPE>
84  void init(ELEMENT_TYPE element)
85  {
86  if (!m_previousElement.hasValue())
87  {
88  m_previousElement = static_cast<uint64_t>(element);
89  }
90  else
91  {
92  if (m_maxBitNumber <= MAX_BIT_NUMBER_LIMIT)
93  m_isPacked = true;
94  const auto previousElement = static_cast<ELEMENT_TYPE>(m_previousElement.value());
95  const uint8_t maxBitNumber = detail::calcBitLength(element, previousElement);
96  if (maxBitNumber > m_maxBitNumber)
97  {
98  m_maxBitNumber = maxBitNumber;
99  if (m_maxBitNumber > MAX_BIT_NUMBER_LIMIT)
100  m_isPacked = false;
101  }
102  m_previousElement = static_cast<uint64_t>(element);
103  }
104  }
105 
111  size_t bitSizeOfDescriptor() const
112  {
113  if (m_isPacked)
114  return 1 + MAX_BIT_NUMBER_BITS;
115  else
116  return 1;
117  }
118 
128  template <typename ARRAY_TRAITS>
129  size_t bitSizeOf(const ARRAY_TRAITS& arrayTraits, size_t bitPosition,
130  typename ARRAY_TRAITS::ElementType element)
131  {
132  if (!m_processingStarted || !m_isPacked)
133  {
134  m_processingStarted = true;
135  return arrayTraits.bitSizeOf(bitPosition, element);
136  }
137  else
138  {
139  return m_maxBitNumber + (m_maxBitNumber > 0 ? 1 : 0);
140  }
141  }
142 
149  void readDescriptor(BitStreamReader& in)
150  {
151  m_isPacked = in.readBool();
152  if (m_isPacked)
153  m_maxBitNumber = static_cast<uint8_t>(in.readBits(MAX_BIT_NUMBER_BITS));
154  }
155 
164  template <typename ARRAY_TRAITS>
165  typename ARRAY_TRAITS::ElementType read(const ARRAY_TRAITS& arrayTraits, BitStreamReader& in)
166  {
167  if (!m_processingStarted || !m_isPacked)
168  {
169  m_processingStarted = true;
170  const auto element = arrayTraits.read(in);
171  m_previousElement = static_cast<uint64_t>(element);
172  return element;
173  }
174  else
175  {
176  if (m_maxBitNumber > 0)
177  {
178  const int64_t delta = in.readSignedBits64(m_maxBitNumber + 1);
179  const typename ARRAY_TRAITS::ElementType element =
180  static_cast<typename ARRAY_TRAITS::ElementType>(
181  m_previousElement.value() + static_cast<uint64_t>(delta));
182  m_previousElement = static_cast<uint64_t>(element);
183  }
184 
185  return static_cast<typename ARRAY_TRAITS::ElementType>(m_previousElement.value());
186  }
187  }
188 
195  void writeDescriptor(BitStreamWriter& out) const
196  {
197  out.writeBool(m_isPacked);
198  if (m_isPacked)
199  out.writeBits(m_maxBitNumber, MAX_BIT_NUMBER_BITS);
200  }
201 
209  template <typename ARRAY_TRAITS>
210  void write(const ARRAY_TRAITS& arrayTraits, BitStreamWriter& out,
211  typename ARRAY_TRAITS::ElementType element)
212  {
213  if (!m_processingStarted || !m_isPacked)
214  {
215  m_processingStarted = true;
216  m_previousElement = static_cast<uint64_t>(element);
217  arrayTraits.write(out, element);
218  }
219  else
220  {
221  if (m_maxBitNumber > 0)
222  {
223  // it's already checked in the init phase that the delta will fit into int64_t
224  const int64_t delta = detail::calcUncheckedDelta(element, m_previousElement.value());
225  out.writeSignedBits64(delta, m_maxBitNumber + 1);
226  m_previousElement = static_cast<uint64_t>(element);
227  }
228  }
229  }
230 
231 private:
232  static const uint8_t MAX_BIT_NUMBER_BITS = 6;
233  static const uint8_t MAX_BIT_NUMBER_LIMIT = 62;
234 
235  bool m_isPacked = false;
236  uint8_t m_maxBitNumber = 0;
237  InplaceOptionalHolder<uint64_t> m_previousElement;
238  bool m_processingStarted = false;
239 };
240 
251 template <typename ALLOC = std::allocator<uint8_t>>
252 class BasicPackingContextNode
253 {
254 public:
256  using allocator_type = RebindAlloc<ALLOC, BasicPackingContextNode>;
258  using Children = std::vector<BasicPackingContextNode, allocator_type>;
259 
265  explicit BasicPackingContextNode(const ALLOC& allocator)
266  : m_children(allocator)
267  {}
268 
274  BasicPackingContextNode& createChild()
275  {
276  m_children.emplace_back(m_children.get_allocator());
277  return m_children.back();
278  }
279 
285  Children& getChildren()
286  {
287  return m_children;
288  }
289 
293  void createContext()
294  {
295  m_context = DeltaContext();
296  }
297 
303  bool hasContext() const
304  {
305  return m_context.hasValue();
306  }
307 
315  DeltaContext& getContext()
316  {
317  return m_context.value();
318  }
319 
320 private:
321  Children m_children;
322  InplaceOptionalHolder<DeltaContext> m_context;
323 };
324 
325 using PackingContextNode = BasicPackingContextNode<>;
